vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
θεμελῐ-όω,
to lay the foundation of, found firmly, πύργους.. φοίνιξι θεμελιώσας [NT+5th c.BC+]:—passive, have the foundations laid, [Refs 1st c.BC+]; ἐπὶ τὴν πέτραν [NT+1st c.BC+]; ἐν ἀγάπῃ τεθ. [NT]
__II destroy utterly, in passive, -ωθέντα (θεμειλωθ- codex)· ἐκ ῥιζῶν ἀρθέντα, [Refs 5th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to lay a foundation; to make steadfastfound
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to lay a foundation; to make steadfastfound
to found, lay the foundation of, Mt. 7:25; Heb. 1:10; metaphorically to ground, establish, render firm and unwavering, make steadfast Eph. 3:17; Col. 1:23; 1Pet. 5:10*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 建立根基, 立下
2) 使穩固, 建立
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 建立根基, 立下
2) 使稳固, 建立
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: để đặt một nền móng ; để làm ổn định
